scripts.ci:build: yarn prod:compile && yarn pre:global && yarn pre:katex && zola build && yarn minify:global && yarn prod:postcss && yarn unique:global
scripts.dev:clean: rm -rf public yarn-error.log node_modules static/js/* ts/compress.js ts/tsconfig* licenses.csv
scripts.dev:format-sub: prettier package.json ts/ configs/ content/ sass/ --config configs/.prettierrc.json
scripts.minify:global: yarn minify:html && yarn minify:svg && yarn run minify:png && yarn run minify:jpeg
scripts.minify:jpeg: find public/ -regex '.*/.*\.jp[eg]?' -exec sh -c 'cp "$0" "$0.tmp" && jpegtran -optimize -progressive -copy none "$0.tmp" > $0 && rm "$0.tmp"' {} \;
scripts.pre:global: yarn pre:generate-licenses && yarn pre:katex && yarn pre:compile-compress
scripts.unique:css: export DATE=$(date +%s) && mv public/main.css public/main-$DATE.css && find public -name '*.html' -exec sed -i "s/main\.css/main-$DATE.css/" {} + && find public -name '*.html' -exec sed -i "s/integrity=sha256-.* rel=stylesheet/integrity=\"sha256-$(shasum -b -a 256 public/main-* | awk '{ print $1 }' | xxd -r -p | base64 | sed 's/\//\\\//g')\" rel=stylesheet/" {} +
scripts.unique:js: export DATE=$(date +%s) && mv public/js/main.js public/js/main-$DATE.js && find public -name '*.html' -exec sed -i "s/js\/main\.js/js\/main-$DATE.js/" {} + && find public -name '*.html' -exec sed -Ei "s/ integrity=sha256-.{44}><\/script>/ integrity=\"sha256-$(shasum -b -a 256 public/js/main-* | awk '{ print $1 }' | xxd -r -p | base64 | sed 's/\//\\\//g')\"><\/script>/" {} +
